title: Source: Google Pixel Watch runs on the same chip as 2018 Galaxy Watch
content:
On Wednesday, Google officially confirmed that it was making a Pixel Watch, but the provided preview was light on concrete specifications as availability is still some months away. 9to5Google has now learned that the Pixel Watch is powered by an Exynos chip that originally debuted with the Samsung Galaxy Watch from 2018.

moreâ€¦

The post Source: Google Pixel Watch runs on the same chip as 2018 Galaxy Watch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: 9to5Google has now learned that the Pixel Watch is powered by an Exynos chip that originally debuted with Samsung's Galaxy Watch from 2018...
